html: he will destroy in this mountain the face of the covering. This covering, or veil, that is "cast over all people" or "all nations" may speak of the dark veil of ignorance or unbelief (Alma 19:6; 2 Cor. 3:14-16; Ether 4:15) that covers the hearts and minds of all people. The Lord has promised, "The day soon cometh that ye shall see me, and know that I am; for the veil of darkness shall soon be rent, and he that is not purified shall not abide the day" (D&C 38:8; 2 Ne. 30:16-18).
